name: Colouring Calico Zip Shopper
description: Colour your own custom design character fashionable cotton shopper. This bag makes a fun way for kids to use their creativity to colour and decorate the bags. It keeps kids entertained for hours and away from electronic devices. The bag is made of 305gsm 100% quality cotton febric with coloured both sides and black zip closure, black webbing shoulder handles with bottom gusset, comes with 8 assorted non toxic coloured wax crayons packed in a recycled cardboard box, which will be packed in a small plastic bag stapled on cotton bag. Crayon Colours: Pink, Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Brown and Black.
productDisclaimer: GST additional. Other additional charges may apply. We reserve the right to change prices and charges without notice.
